comment: I tire of this take . When I worked in academia I saw that students show up to good classes , if they don't it's usually due to serious reasons that they , as adults , should be given leeway to handle . The other reason students don't show up is because the class is badly taught . <URL>

comment: You got me ... I shouldn't care about my students and their academic success . Attendance shouldn't matter from elementary school through college . You're right , I'm wrong .
